results.title: The effect of simvastatin on the survival of ischaemic skin flap: an experimental study in rats.

results.title: Protective effect of simvastatin and VULM 1457 in ischaemic-reperfused myocardium of the diabetic-hypercholesterolemic rats.
results.text_hl: Protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_VULM_1457 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C505646 @@@VULM 1457@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@-reperfused @DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@myocardium@@@ of the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@-@DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: The effect of acute simvastatin administration on the severity of arrhythmias resulting from ischaemia and reperfusion in the canine: Is there a role for nitric oxide?
results.text_hl: There were also less marked @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ changes in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ than in the controls.

citations.NLM: Kisvári G, Kovács M, Gardi J, Seprényi G, Kaszaki J, Végh Á. results.title: Ezetimibe, cardiovascular risk and atherogenic dyslipidaemia
results.text_hl: The @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@Simvastatin and Ezetimibe@@@ in @DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@Aortic Stenosis@@@ (SEAS) study has further shown that combination treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly reduced LDL cholesterol levels in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@aortic stenosis@@@, but did not affect the primary end point of @DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@aortic valve@@@ and cardiovascular events, although a significant reduction in the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ events was reported.

citations.NLM: Rizzo M, Battista Rini G.  Ezetimibe, cardiovascular risk and atherogenic dyslipidaemia Arch Med Sci. 2011 Feb;7(1):5-7. PMID: 22291726
citations.BibTeX: @article{22291726, title={ Ezetimibe, cardiovascular risk and atherogenic dyslipidaemia}, author={Rizzo M and Battista Rini G}, journal={Arch Med Sci}, volume={7}, number={1}, pages={5-7}}
